ComicInfo.Title: Table of Contents; The Journey Halfway 1:1; What Separates Humans From Animals?; Derek Seals Continues [Chapter Two]; Lemon Harangue Pie With The Gump; Ignatz: Dumb Comics For Dumb People No. 1; Into Every Life A Little Brain Must Fall...; Bloody Hell!; No Shit Man; Great Mythical Characters Of The Twentieth Century No. 4: The Man Who Told You; Dot The Tease Crosses Her Eyes; The Blardy Blardy Man Never Sleeps; The Redoubtable Tarquin Investigates Mysticism And The Sublime In Women's Art In Aotearoa II; The Journey Halfway 1:2; Calling Claire: Hour One; Skinny Bill; The Journey Halfway 1:3; Piano Chocolat
ComicInfo.Summary: From Table of Contents: "Legar Reuths is an obscure New Zeland cartoonist whose bizarre self-published comic strips of the 1970s influenced a generation. Skinny Bill is reprinted here with his permission."
